meanings.definition: Move out of or away from something and come into view.
meanings.sent1: The rabbit will emerge from its burrow at dawn.
meanings.sent2: The sun will emerge from behind the clouds soon.
meanings.sent3: The magician made the coin emerge from the volunteer's ear.
meanings.sent4: The truth will always emerge, like a flower breaking through the soil.
meanings.sent5: The stars emerge in the night sky, twinkling brightly.

meanings.sent1: Her talent will emerge during the performance.
meanings.sent2: The importance of the issue will emerge in the discussion.
meanings.sent3: The solution to the puzzle will emerge when you least expect it.
meanings.sent4: His leadership skills will emerge like a beacon in times of crisis.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the painting will emerge once you step back and look closely.

meanings.definition: Recover from or survive a difficult situation.
meanings.sent1: She will emerge stronger after facing the challenges.
meanings.sent2: The team will emerge victorious despite the setbacks.
meanings.sent3: The hero will emerge unscathed from the battle, much to everyone's surprise.
meanings.sent4: Like a phoenix, she will emerge from the ashes of adversity.
meanings.sent5: The community will emerge united after the disaster, showing resilience.
